mapper.insert: insert into article (name, title, message, image, html, nLook, nLove, timeCreate, timeUpdate, deleted) values (#{name}, #{title}, #{message}, #{image}, #{html}, #{nLook}, #{nLove}, #{timeCreate}, #{timeUpdate}, #{deleted})
mapper.update: update article set name = #{name}, title = #{title}, message = #{message}, image = #{image}, html = #{html}, timeUpdate = #{timeUpdate} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.name, a.title, a.message, date_format(a.timeCreate, '%Y-%m') as month, group_concat(b.title separator '::') as books, a.timeCreate as time from article a left join relationship r on r.article = a.id left join book b on b.id = r.book where a.deleted = #{deleted} and a.id > 10 group by a.id order by a.timeCreate desc;
select date_format(timeCreate, '%Y-%m') time from article where deleted = #{deleted} and id > 10 group by date_format(timeCreate, '%Y-%m') order by time desc;

select a.id, a.name, a.image, a.title, a.message, a.html, a.nLook, a.nLove, a.timeCreate, a.timeUpdate, group_concat(b.title separator '::') as books from article a left join relationship r on r.article = a.id left join book b on b.id = r.book where a.deleted = #{deleted} and a.id > 10 group by a.id order by a.timeUpdate desc
